scripts.check-images: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const images=['hero-icecream.jpg','vanilla.jpg','chocolate.jpg','strawberry.jpg','mint.jpg','caramel.jpg','cookies.jpg','pistachio.jpg','mango.jpg'];const missing=images.filter(img=>!fs.existsSync(path.join('public','images',img)));if(missing.length){console.log('❌ Missing images:',missing.join(', '));console.log('Run: npm run gen-images');}else{console.log('✅ All images present');}"
